Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3267809,"totalDownVotes":288597,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":98558,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. ü•ÅMusic by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":283113,"totalDownVotes":147560,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":23195,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":7284047,"creatorName":"Wrongful Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":33527,"totalDownVotes":7049,"universeId":2411591707,"name":"[5X STATS] A Hero's Destiny","placeId":6461766546,"playerCount":12875,"imageToken":"T_6461766546_8638","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Train with friends, battle difficult enemies, and complete challenging quests while working your way towards becoming the strongest! 

Changelog
- New code system
- New x2 XP/Yen/Strength boosts
- Added a confirmation for spinning when you have a legendary class
- Rebirths now increase spin luck 
- Added a buy all spins button
- Added another tyrone dummy npc to test critical damage
- Added 3 songs
- Scanner gamepass now abbreviates stats 

Controls
Z - Train
X - Lockon
N - Equip Sword (Ninja)
Q/E/R/F/C - Abilities
G - Awakening
CTRL - Sprint"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1201720,"totalDownVotes":68354,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":17283,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1809099,"totalDownVotes":141469,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8711,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!
